participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, enjoys exploring artistic endeavors.
participant_1.background: I spent time with my family last year. My favourite band is Rush. I enjoy my work as a software engineer, but it can be stressful. My favorite musician is Charlie Daniels. I am always happy when the summer ends.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and fun-loving, enjoys physical activities and treasure hunting.
participant_2.background: I start working with my brother-in-law in Hollywood. I can't do math. Sometimes I like to visit thrift shops. I love going to the gym. I love eating at McDonald's.

content.text: what do you enjoy most about your work?
I enjoy the creative aspects of it.
what kind of work do you do?
I am an animator.
Oh that's cool, I've always been interested in animation.
Do you do any artistic things?
I enjoy painting and drawing.
That's awesome! I'm not too artistic myself but I do love to go to thrift stores and find cool stuff.
I love thrift stores too! I always find the best stuff there.
Me too! I recently found this awesome pair of jeans for like 5 bucks!
That's a great deal! I love finding hidden gems at thrift stores.
Me too! It's like a treasure hunt every time I go.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to go to the gym and work out.
That's awesome! I should really get back into working out.
You should! It's so good for you.
I know, I know. I'll start tomorrow.
Good for you!
Thanks!
You're welcome!
